td.a:
Talk
of the Nation, Science Friday

tr.td:
An edited version of a radio
program that aired on September 9, 1994. Science Friday host, Ira Flatow,
interviewed guests Keith Devlin, Dean of Science at St. Mary's College, and
William Dunham, math professor at Muhlenberg College.

This article, featured in Yale
Scientific magazine, describes a recent applications of fluid dynamics to
swimsuit technology. The website provides an explanation of the forces acting
on a human swimmer while moving through water and gives examples of...
